disputed.description: Claims SDD contains corrupted placeholders/template artifacts in code examples
disputed.rationale: False positive — no {{DOCUMENT_CONTENT}} or template markers exist in the SDD. The Flatline orchestrator's injection markers were misidentified by the skeptic as being in the document itself. Verified via grep: zero matches for '{{' in sdd.md.

blockers.concern: Document contains templating artifacts that would break scripts
blockers.rationale: False positive — same root cause as IMP-008. The SDD contains valid bash code in markdown fences. Zero '{{' template markers found in the file. The skeptic conflated the Flatline orchestrator's template injection with the document content.

blockers.concern: Custom route parsing silently ignored when yq missing
blockers.rationale: Addressed by IMP-004 integration — init_route_table() now uses grep to detect custom routes in config, and fails-closed (exit 2) when yq is missing. Override available via LOA_ALLOW_DEFAULTS_WITHOUT_YQ=1.
